info.female_impression:
The first time I saw him, I was definitely taken aback...
Who would've thought Ben was unexpectedly a soft, furry, gentle-natured bear!
info.male_impression:
Never judge a book by its cover.
That said, it seems he's often required to present a menacing image to deter the enemy... and it appears to be quite effective.
info.outlook_desc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Ben possesses outstanding Ether aptitude, and is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Based on the data, Ben's Ether aptitude places him in the top tier at Belobog Heavy Industries. Coupled with his Thiren traits (better adaptation to Hollow environments than humans, faster mutation rate after exposure to corruption, but also rapid recovery), he is deemed highly suitable for long-term work within Hollows.
info.profile_desc:
Ben is the financial and asset management director at Belobog Heavy Industries and one of Koleda's trusted aides.
"I enjoy mathematics, but that doesn't stop me from giving thugs a good smack."
He's a burly and strong Thiren. Despite his tough exterior, he's of a surprisingly sensitive and detail-oriented nature, especially when it comes to numbers.
Originally a frontline mechanical operator at Belobog, his talents caught Koleda's discerning eye, leading to his promotion to a managerial position responsible for the company's finances.
Grateful for Koleda's trust in him, he remains profoundly loyal to her.
His favorite food is black caviar, but he dislikes fish.

I once witnessed this imposing figure seated in a small office chair, wearing small glasses, and carefully cross-referencing Belobog's asset records while mashing away at a calculator with his huge fingers.
Question: Is that what they call on Inter-Knot a "Kawaii Curveball?"

mindscape_cinemas.name: Reacting Force
mindscape_cinemas.description: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's Special Attack or EX Special Attack, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?"
"Looks like your calculations are off."

mindscape_cinemas.name: Offense Through Defense
mindscape_cinemas.description: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's Special Attack or EX Special Attack, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting.
He believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Careful Accounting
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Agile Adaptation
mindscape_cinemas.description: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his Special Attack or EX Special Attack, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation.
Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Meticulous Detail
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Ben's keen eye doesn't miss a single error in statements. The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Wild Spirit
mindscape_cinemas.description: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's EX Special Attack, Daze inflicted by Basic Attacks, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.
They can't be appeased with food alone.
When they lose their temper, the only thing you can do is run for your life...
—The discontinued "Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens"

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Debt Reconciliation
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge: Missing Invoice
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Incoming Expense
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Dodge to activate:
Strikes enemies in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Accounts Settled
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Fiscal Fist
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attack before unleashing a forward strike, dealing Physical DMG. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Hold  to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while launching strikes.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Cashflow Counter
descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attacks before unleashing a forward strike, dealing Fire DMG. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Hold  to remain in the Blocking stance.
While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time.
After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time.
The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP.
When this skill is activated, the Shield is restored to its maximum value.
After activating the skill, press  again to follow up with a powerful forward strike, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Ben is invulnerable when activating Block.
Ben is invulnerable while launching strikes.

descriptions.name: Chain Attack: Signed and Sealed
descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Ultimate: Complete Payback
descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG.
When activating the skill, additionally recover 3 Assist Points.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Joint Account
descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

descriptions.name: Defensive Assist: Risk Allocation
descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Don't Break Contract
descriptions.description:
Press  after a Defensive Assist to activate:
Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions:
Ben's initial ATK increases along with his initial DEF. He gains 40% of his initial DEF as ATK.
When Ben launches a follow-up attack during his EX Special Attack, all squad members gain a Shield of 15% of his DEF +100, lasting for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While the Shield from Core Passive: Guardian is in effect, the character's CRIT Rate is increased by 16%.
